scripts.release: npm run build:android && npm run copy-dist
scripts.docker:build:debug: docker run -t -i -v $(pwd):/workspace -v ~/.gradle/:/home/user/.gradle/ -w /workspace -e LOCAL_USER_ID=`id -u $USER` adambene/react-native-android /bin/sh -c "cd android && ./gradlew --stacktrace assembleDebug"
scripts.docker:build:release: docker run -t -i -v $(pwd):/workspace -v ~/.gradle/:/home/user/.gradle/ -w /workspace -e LOCAL_USER_ID=`id -u $USER` adambene/react-native-android /bin/sh -c "cd android && ./gradlew --stacktrace assembleRelease"
